risk_zones.name: Smartphone
risk_zones.risk: Carries thousands of bacteria, can cause skin & eye infections.
risk_zones.fact: Smartphones are 10x dirtier than toilet seats!

risk_zones.name: Keyboard
risk_zones.risk: Dust and germs can cause allergies & infections.
risk_zones.fact: Keyboards can carry 400x more bacteria than a toilet seat.

risk_zones.name: Door Knobs
risk_zones.risk: Frequently touched by multiple people, spreading germs like cold and flu viruses.
risk_zones.tip: Wipe down with a disinfectant spray or wipe daily, especially in high-traffic areas.
risk_zones.fact: A single doorknob can be a reservoir for germs from dozens of different people in a single day.

risk_zones.name: Light Switches
risk_zones.risk: Touched daily by many hands, accumulating bacteria and viruses that can easily transfer.
risk_zones.tip: Clean weekly with a disinfectant wipe. Be careful not to let liquid seep inside.
risk_zones.fact: Light switches in public restrooms can have more bacteria than a trash can.
